heading: HR01046
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION - LAND TRANSPORTATION OFFICE (DOTr-LTO) TO REVIEW AND REVISE THE IMPLEMENTING RULES AND REGULATIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10913, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE ANTI-DISTRACTED  DRIVING ACT" TO STRICTLY CONFORM WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THE LAW AND NOT TO VEER AWAY FROM ITS INTENT, AND TO CONDUCT A MANDATORY NATIONWIDE PUBLIC INFORMATION, EDUCATION AND COMMUNICATION CAMPAIGN FOR A PERIOD OF NOT LESS THAN SIX (6) MONTHS
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-05-31
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01046
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION - LAND TRANSPORTATION OFFICE (DOTr-LTO) TO REVIEW AND REVISE THE IMPLEMENTING RULES AND REGULATIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10913, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE ANTI-DISTRACTED DRIVING ACT" TO STRICTLY CONFORM WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THE LAW AND NOT TO VEER AWAY FROM ITS INTENT, AND TO CONDUCT A MANDATORY NATIONWIDE PUBLIC INFORMATION, EDUCATION AND COMMUNICATION CAMPAIGN FOR A PERIOD OF NOT LESS THAN SIX (6) MONTHS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CALIXTO-RUBIANO, EMI G.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-31
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2017-05-31
